name: py-cffi

description: Foreign Function Interface for Python calling C code

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pycparser
dependencies.description: A complete parser of the C language, written in pure python.

dependencies.name: libffi
dependencies.description:
The libffi library provides a portable, high level programming interface
to various calling conventions. This allows a programmer to call any
function specified by a call interface description at run time.

dependent_to.name: py-argon2-cffi
dependent_to.description: The secure Argon2 password hashing algorithm..

dependent_to.name: py-fenics-ffcx
dependent_to.description: Next generation FEniCS Form Compiler

dependent_to.name: dftd4
dependent_to.description:
Generally Applicable Atomic-Charge Dependent London Dispersion
Correction

dependent_to.name: py-pycares
dependent_to.description:
pycares is a Python module which provides an interface to c-ares. c-ares
is a C library that performs DNS requests and name resolutions
asynchronously.

dependent_to.name: py-fenics-dolfinx
dependent_to.description:
Python interface to the next generation FEniCS problem solving
environment

dependent_to.name: py-gevent
dependent_to.description: gevent is a coroutine-based Python networking library.

dependent_to.name: py-pynacl
dependent_to.description: Python binding to the Networking and Cryptography (NaCl) library.

dependent_to.name: py-brotlipy
dependent_to.description: Python binding to the Brotli library.

dependent_to.name: clingo
dependent_to.description:
Clingo: A grounder and solver for logic programs Clingo is part of the
Potassco project for Answer Set Programming (ASP). ASP offers a simple
and powerful modeling language to describe combinatorial problems as
logic programs. The clingo system then takes such a logic program and
computes answer sets representing solutions to the given problem.

dependent_to.name: flux-core
dependent_to.description: A next-generation resource manager (pre-alpha)

dependent_to.name: clingo-bootstrap
dependent_to.description: Clingo with some options used for bootstrapping

dependent_to.name: legion
dependent_to.description:
Legion is a data-centric parallel programming system for writing
portable high performance programs targeted at distributed heterogeneous
architectures. Legion presents abstractions which allow programmers to
describe properties of program data (e.g. independence, locality). By
making the Legion programming system aware of the structure of program
data, it can automate many of the tedious tasks programmers currently
face, including correctly extracting task- and data-level parallelism
and moving data around complex memory hierarchies. A novel mapping
interface provides explicit programmer controlled placement of data in
the memory hierarchy and assignment of tasks to processors in a way that
is orthogonal to correctness, thereby enabling easy porting and tuning
of Legion applications to new architectures.

dependent_to.name: py-horovod
dependent_to.description:
Horovod is a distributed deep learning training framework for
TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Apache MXNet.

dependent_to.name: py-cryptography
dependent_to.description:
cryptography is a package which provides cryptographic recipes and
primitives to Python developers

dependent_to.name: py-pyzmq
dependent_to.description: PyZMQ: Python bindings for zeromq.

dependent_to.name: py-rpy2
dependent_to.description:
rpy2 is a redesign and rewrite of rpy. It is providing a low-level
interface to R from Python, a proposed high-level interface, including
wrappers to graphical libraries, as well as R-like structures and
functions.

dependent_to.name: py-xtb
dependent_to.description: Python API for the extended tight binding program package

dependent_to.name: py-xattr
dependent_to.description:
A python interface to access extended file attributes, sans libattr
dependency.

dependent_to.name: geopm
dependent_to.description:
GEOPM is an extensible power management framework targeting HPC. The
GEOPM package provides libgeopm, libgeopmpolicy and applications
geopmctl and geopmpolicy, as well as tools for postprocessing. GEOPM is
designed to be extended for new control algorithms and new hardware
power management features via its plugin infrastructure. Note: GEOPM
interfaces with hardware using Model Specific Registers (MSRs). For
propper usage make sure MSRs are made available directly or via the msr-
safe kernel module by your administrator.

dependent_to.name: py-torch
dependent_to.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.

dependent_to.name: py-gf256
dependent_to.description:
GF256 is an implementation of GF(2**8). This Galois Field allows you to
perform finite field arithmetic on byte sized integers.

dependent_to.name: py-darshan
dependent_to.description:
Python utilities to interact with Darshan log records of HPC
applications.

dependent_to.name: py-soundfile
dependent_to.description: SoundFile is an audio library based on libsndfile, CFFI and NumPy.

dependent_to.name: py-charm4py
dependent_to.description:
Charm4py (Charm++ for Python) is a distributed computing and parallel
programming framework for Python, for the productive development of
fast, parallel and scalable applications. It is built on top of Charm++,
a C++ adaptive runtime system that has seen extensive use in the
scientific and high-performance computing (HPC) communities across many
disciplines, and has been used to develop applications that run on a
wide range of devices: from small multi-core devices up to the largest
supercomputers.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-datalake-store
dependent_to.description: Azure Data Lake Store Filesystem Client Library for Python.

dependent_to.name: tblite
dependent_to.description: Light-weight tight-binding framework

dependent_to.name: simple-dftd3
dependent_to.description: Simple reimplementation of the DFT-D3 dispersion correction

dependent_to.name: py-cairocffi
dependent_to.description:
cairocffi is a CFFI-based drop-in replacement for Pycairo, a set of
Python bindings and object-oriented API for cairo. Cairo is a 2D vector
graphics library with support for multiple backends including image
buffers, PNG, PostScript, PDF, and SVG file output.

dependent_to.name: mpibind
dependent_to.description:
A memory-driven algorithm to map parallel codes to heterogeneous
architectures

dependent_to.name: py-argon2-cffi-bindings
dependent_to.description: Low-level CFFI bindings for Argon2.

dependent_to.name: py-medaka
dependent_to.description:
medaka is a tool to create consensus sequences and variant calls from
nanopore sequencing data. This task is performed using neural networks
applied a pileup of individual sequencing reads against a draft
assembly. It provides state-of-the-art results outperforming sequence-
graph based methods and signal-based methods, whilst also being faster.

dependent_to.name: py-cfgrib
dependent_to.description:
Python interface to map GRIB files to the NetCDF Common Data Model
following the CF Convention using ecCodes.

dependent_to.name: py-pygit2
dependent_to.description:
Pygit2 is a set of Python bindings to the libgit2 shared library,
libgit2 implements the core of Git.

dependent_to.name: py-eccodes
dependent_to.description: Python interface to the ecCodes GRIB and BUFR decoder/encoder.

dependent_to.name: py-bcrypt
dependent_to.description: Modern password hashing for your software and your servers
